achievements.name: Rapidfire
achievements.description: Reach +200% attack speed.

achievements.name: Automation Activation
achievements.description: Activate 6 turrets in a single run.

achievements.name: ...To Be Left Alone
achievements.description: Stabilize the Cell in the Void Fields.

achievements.name: Warm For Life
achievements.description: Die three times while burning.

achievements.name: Captain: Worth Every Penny
achievements.description: As Captain, repair and recruit a TC-280 Prototype.

achievements.name: Captain: Mastery
achievements.description: As Captain, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Captain: Wanderlust
achievements.description: As Captain, visit 10 different environments in a single run.

achievements.name: Moon Worshipper
achievements.description: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

achievements.name: Glorious Battle
achievements.description: Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health.

achievements.name: Cleanup Duty
achievements.description: Destroy 20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

achievements.name: Commando: Mastery
achievements.description: As Commando, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Commando: Godspeed
achievements.description: As Commando, fully charge the first-stage teleporter before the timer hits 5 minutes.

achievements.name: Commando: Rolling Thunder
achievements.description: As Commando, land the killing blow on an Overloading Worm.

achievements.name: Commando: Incorruptible
achievements.description: As Commando, clear 20 stages in a single run without picking up any Lunar items.

achievements.name: The Long Road
achievements.description: Complete 20 stages in a single run.

achievements.name: Engineering Perfection
achievements.description: Complete 30 stages.

achievements.name: Washed Away
achievements.description: Beat the game.

achievements.name: The Calm
achievements.description: Beat the game on Monsoon difficulty.

achievements.name: Ascendant
achievements.description: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain.

achievements.name: Prismatically Aligned
achievements.description: Complete a Prismatic Trial.

achievements.name: Advancement
achievements.description: Complete a Teleporter event.

achievements.name: Flawless
achievements.description: Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit.

achievements.name: Warrior
achievements.description: Reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event without dying.

achievements.name: Naturopath
achievements.description: Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event.

achievements.name: True Respite
achievements.description: Obliterate yourself at the Obelisk..

achievements.name: Acrid: Mastery
achievements.description: As Acrid, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Acrid: Bad Medicine
achievements.description: As Acrid, land the final blow on a Scavenger.

achievements.name: Acrid: Easy Prey
achievements.description: As Acrid, land the killing blow on 50 total enemies that have 1 hit point left.

achievements.name: Acrid: Pandemic
achievements.description: As Acrid, inflict Poison 1000 total times.

achievements.name: Guidance Offline
achievements.description: Defeat the unique guardian of Siren's Call.

achievements.name: Learning Process
achievements.description: Die 5 times.

achievements.name: I Love Dying!
achievements.description: Die 20 times.

achievements.name: Experimenting
achievements.description: Pick up 5 different types of Equipment.

achievements.name: The Basics
achievements.description: Discover 10 unique white items.

achievements.name: Engineer: Better With Friends
achievements.description: As Engineer, recruit 12 minions at one time.

achievements.name: Engineer: Mastery
achievements.description: As Engineer, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Engineer: Zero Sum
achievements.description: As Engineer, finish charging the teleporter with zero monsters remaining on the stage.

achievements.name: Engineer: 100% Calculated
achievements.description: As Engineer, defeat the teleporter boss in less than 5 seconds after it spawns.

achievements.name: "Is This Bugged?"
achievements.description: Fail the Shrine of Chance 3 times in a row.

achievements.name: Her Concepts
achievements.description: Find the Altar to N'kuhana.

achievements.name: [REDACTED]
achievements.description: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

achievements.name: Newtist
achievements.description: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

achievements.name: Pause.
achievements.description: Free the survivor suspended in time.

achievements.name: Deicide
achievements.description: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

achievements.name: Macho
achievements.description: Deal 5000 damage in one shot.

achievements.name: Huntress: Finishing Touch
achievements.description: As Huntress, land a killing blow with every possible hit of a single glaive.

achievements.name: Huntress: Mastery
achievements.description: As Huntress, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Huntress: One Shot, One Kill
achievements.description: As Huntress, collect and carry 12 Crowbars at once.

achievements.name: Huntress: Piercing Wind
achievements.description: As Huntress, start and finish either Rallypoint Delta or Scorched Acres without falling below 100% health.

achievements.name: Blockade Breaker
achievements.description: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

achievements.name: Keyed Up
achievements.description: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

achievements.name: Death Do Us Part
achievements.description: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct.

achievements.name: Elite Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat an Elite-type monster.

achievements.name: Cut Down
achievements.description: Defeat 500 elite monsters.

achievements.name: Blackout
achievements.description: Defeat the unique guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.

achievements.name: Slaughter
achievements.description: Defeat 3000 enemies.

achievements.name: Loader: Earthshatter
achievements.description: As Loader, land a Charged Gauntlet hit at 300mph or higher.

achievements.name: Loader: Mastery
achievements.description: As Loader, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Loader: Swing By
achievements.description: As Loader, reach and proceed through the Celestial Portal in 25 minutes or less.

achievements.name: Bookworm
achievements.description: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

achievements.name: Deja Vu?
achievements.description: Loop back to the first stage.

achievements.name: Artificer: Orbital Bombardment
achievements.description: As Artificer, kill 15 enemies before touching the ground.

achievements.name: Artificer: Mastery
achievements.description: As Artificer, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: Artificer: Chunked!
achievements.description: As Artificer, fully defeat the teleporter boss in a one-second burst of damage.

achievements.name: Artificer: Massacre
achievements.description: As Artificer, perform a multikill of 20 enemies.

achievements.name: Multikill!
achievements.description: Kill 15 enemies simultaneously.

achievements.name: One with the Woods
achievements.description: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

achievements.name: Mercenary: Demon of the Skies
achievements.description: As Mercenary, don't touch the ground for 30 seconds.

achievements.name: Going Fast Recommended
achievements.description: Reach +300% movespeed (includes sprinting).

achievements.name: Warmonger
achievements.description: Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage.

achievements.name: Never Back Down
achievements.description: In 4 consecutive stages don’t leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

achievements.description: Complete the Trial of Spite.

achievements.description: Complete the Trial of Frailty.

achievements.name: ...Maybe One More.
achievements.description: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D Printer.

achievements.name: Verified
achievements.description: Complete the first Teleporter event 5 times.

achievements.name: Power Plant
achievements.description: Repair the broken robot with an Escape Pod's Fuel Array.

achievements.name: The Lone Survivor
achievements.description: Stay alive for 30 consecutive minutes.

achievements.name: The Demons And The Crabs
achievements.description: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

achievements.name: MUL-T: Mastery
achievements.description: As MUL-T, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon.

achievements.name: MUL-T: Pest Control
achievements.description: As MUL-T, defeat two Beetle Queens without leaving the teleporter zone.

achievements.name: MUL-T: Gotcha!
achievements.description: As MUL-T, land the killing blow on an Imp Overlord with the Preon Accumulator.

achievements.name: Mechanic
achievements.description: Repair 30 drones or turrets.

achievements.name: Funded!
achievements.description: Collect $30,480 total gold.

achievements.name: REX: Bushwhacked
achievements.description: As REX, complete an entire teleporter event while under 50% health.

achievements.name: Cosmic Explorer
achievements.description: Discover and enter three unique portals.

achievements.name: Bandit: Mastery

achievements.name: REX: Full of Life
